content.first: Oh and fun! making change should also be fun and easy. That way as many people as possible want to join in!
content.third: The time for waiting for others to fix this planet is over. Modern technology allows us to coordinate action and share great ideas for change in a way never before possible
content.fourth: While each action may feel like a tiny ripple. As more and more people join in the effects multiply, combining to form an unstoppable wave, a Positive Action Movement which can sweep across this planet
content.fifth: Our message is that YOU have the power to change the world around you, and our mission is to give you the tools to create that positive change

content.first: You'll be a part of a growing global Movement with a plan to change the world
content.second: Meeting positive, pro-active, awesome new friends both locally, and globally
content.third: Together using simple, fun activities and exploring new ideas to shape friendlier, happier communities
content.fourth: Bringing more peace and well-being to everyone, everywhere
